description: Lists the Amazon Kendra indexes that you created.

nested_items.name: IndexConfigurationSummaryItems
nested_items.description: An array of summary information on the configuration of one or more indexes.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A identifier for the index. Use this to identify the index when you are using APIs such as Query, DescribeIndex, UpdateIndex, and DeleteIndex.

nested_items.name: Edition
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the index is a Enterprise Edition index or a Developer Edition index.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the index was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the index was last updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the index. When the status is ACTIVE, the index is ready to search.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of indexes.
